channel.title: job hunt on Oh The Huge Manatee!
channel.description: Recent content in job hunt on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: I'm joining Microsoft, because they're doing Open Source Right
item.description: I’m excited to announce that I’ve signed with Microsoft as a Principal Software Engineering Manager. I’m joining Microsoft because they are doing enterprise Open Source the Right Way, and I want to be a part of it. This is a sentence that I never believed I would write or say, so I want to explain. First I have to acknowledge the history. I co-founded my first tech company just as the Halloween documents were leaked.
